ProjectTitle: RecyClear - Data- & AI-driven sorting for efficient rigid plastics recycling
InitialFeedbackHistory:
09/01/2024
Please note that you used an older DMP template. For your future DMPs, please use the Flemish standard DMP template that is now used by all Flemish funders (FWO, BOF/IOF and VLAIO), this is very similar to the one you used. You can find this template in DMPonline.be and on the FWO website (www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/)
Storage/preservation: please clarify which cloud storage you will use, note that cloud storage is usually not very suitable for long term storage, these may be  linked to a user account and you may lose data when researchers leave. Consult the storage guide to compare solutions that KU Leuven ICTS offers: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. Also note that KU Leuven policy asks to store all relevant data for 10 years, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
Sharing: note that scientific data is a data journal, not a data repository. You can use a repository such as KU Leuven RDR where you can share your data and in addition your data is securely preserved for 10 years without additional costs, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr and https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
